subject: Re: Access to website for new agency
preview: Hi @andy I'm done adding them to the site's wp admin dashboard, just waiting for Joel confirmation with the cpanel acces they are asking. This is actioned in ticket 149814. To prevent confusion, I wil

full_threads.body: Hi @andy I'm done adding them to the site's wp admin dashboard, just waiting for Joel confirmation with the cpanel acces they are asking. This is actioned in ticket 149814. To prevent confusion, I will closed this ticket.

Hi Team,

Please confirm with Jack directly and cc me once completed.

Thank you

*

Hi Jack,

For sure - we'll get them added and confirm.

Keep us posted on how we can be helpful.

Have a great weekend ahead.
Heath

jzoumaras@artisteplasticsurgery.com.au> wrote:

Jack

On Fri, Apr 4, 2025 at 3:37 PM Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au> wrote:

> Hi Jack,
>
> Yes - we can.
>
> The backend + Cpanel logins are the keys to the castle, so we always ask
> to ensure clients know the implications of sharing these.
>
> We also help several clients acquire new customers using Adwords and
> would be able to do this for you too (even if a proposal or
> competitor analysis would be helpful). Looping in @Andy Crebar
> <heath@wolfiq.com.au> for this too.
>
> Let us know if we could do some free research and send you a proposal (or
> if not, the email that you'd like to add to the accounts).
>
> Thanks,
> Heath
>
